boardgame.name: Islebound
boardgame.description: Set sail in a mystical archipelago filled with bustling towns, sea monsters, pirates, and gold! Compete to build the best sea-faring nation with up to three friends by collecting treasure, hiring crew, and conquering or befriending island towns._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Islebound, you take command of a ship and crew. You sail to island towns, collecting resources, hiring crew, and commissioning buildings for your capital city. Each building has a unique ability, and your combination of buildings can greatly enhance your strength as a trader, builder, or invader. You also recruit pirates and sea monsters to conquer towns, which, once conquered, allow you to complete the town action for free, and charge a fee to opponents if they want to use it. Alternatively, you can complete events that give influence, which can be used to befriend towns._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are many routes to success. Will you be a ruthless conqueror, careful diplomat, or shrewd merchant in your race to the top?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player with the most wealth and most-impressive capital city will win the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Kickstarter edition! free USA shipping! Ask about international shipping.

This listing is ONLY FOR KS wooden Fish, Wood, and Ship tokens and NOT FOR THE FULL GAME. Buyer will receive the following: 24x Wooden Fish Tokens 24x Wooden Wood Tokens 4x Wooden Ship Tokens (one each in each player color) Shipping will be actual cost + shipping supplies (not much in this case). If you live in the Columbus, OH area, we can work out a face to face exchange. Cash is an option in this case. I am also open to trades but only for items found on my want in trade / wishlist.
